Query:
SELECT 
    				t.TransactionName, 
    				count(*) ,
    				decode(s.status, 4, 'Success', 5 , 'Failed' ),
    				sum(s.transactionamount) as Amount, 
    				Concat(to_char(s.LastUpdateTime,'YYYY '), to_char(s.LastUpdateTime, 'MONTH')) 
				FROM 
					service_charge_txn_log s, 
					transaction_type t
				WHERE
					s.TransactiontypeID = t.ID
					and t.TransactionName in ('CheckBalance', 'History', 'ChangePIN','Transfer', 'InterBankTransfer', 'Purchase', 'BillPay')
					and (s.LastUpdateTime between ${StartTime} and ${EndTime})
				GROUP BY
					t.TransactionName, to_char(s.LastUpdateTime, 'YYYY '),
					to_char(s.LastUpdateTime, 'MONTH'), s.TransactiontypeID , s.status;
